evidence.text: Case 2:20-cv-00410-RBS-LRL   Document 2-1   Filed 08/05/20   Page 1 of 32 PageID# 15

5 | 2020-08-31 | ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED. The Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. The Court retains complete jurisdiction of this matter to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree
